channel.title: Posts on my new hugo site

item.title: third
item.description:
Enough Hugo!

Hugo might be fun! Let’s do something else, though. We’ll put Hugo’s stuff onto github, find out how to push the content to the gh-pages and move on to Mkdocs.

item.title: second
item.description:
That was quick! While Hugo watches, changes go up on the website before I can turn my head.

Right now, hugo is looking like a blog creator.

item.title: first
item.description:
Headline: What to do

Hugo told me to create this file but not what to do with it.

Hugo seems slick in parts but is a real irritation to run in windows (ATM).
